item.Description: Position x.
Position y.
Position z.
Rotation about x.
Rotation about y.
Rotation about z.

SALTelemetry.Description: Measured axial actuator forces. Increasing force corresponds to increasing tension in the load cell. The elements are the actuator Ids from 1 to 72. The related ring Ids are B1-B30, C1-C24, and D1-D18.

item.Description: Total force command for each actuator in sequence.
Force measurement for each actuator in sequence.
Hardpoint compensation force for each actuator in sequence.

SALTelemetry.Description: Measured tangent actuator forces. Increasing force corresponds to increasing tension in the load cell. The elements are the actuator Ids from 73 to 78. The related ring Ids are A1-A6. The related degrees are 0, 60, 120, 180, 240, and 300.

item.Description: Total force command for each actuator in sequence.
Force measurement for each tangent actuator in sequence.
Hardpoint compensation force for each actuator in sequence.

SALTelemetry.Description: Mirror and cell temperature sensor readings.

item.Description: Ring temperatures: LG2-1, LG2-2, LG2-3, LG2-4, LG3-1, LG3-2, LG3-3, LG3-4, LG4-1, LG4-2, LG4-3, and LG4-4.
Intake temperatures: #1 and #2.
Exhaust temperatures: #1 and #2.

SALTelemetry.Description: M2 internal inclinometer reading transforms to the zenith angle.

item.Description: Zenith angle is 0 degree when the telescope is at zenith.
Reading angle of inclinometer (0-360 degree).
Processed angle of inclinometer (0-360 degree).

SALTelemetry.Description: Axial actuator stepper motor position in steps. Increasing step corresponds to counterclockwise rotation of the motor shaft, looking along the shaft in the direction of the motor. The elements are the actuator Ids from 1 to 72. The related ring Ids are B1-B30, C1-C24, and D1-D18.

item.Description: Array of steps for each axial actuator in sequence.

SALTelemetry.Description: Tangent actuator stepper motor position in steps. Increasing sign indicates extension towards the mirror. The elements are the actuator Ids from 73 to 78. The related ring Ids are A1-A6. The related degrees are 0, 60, 120, 180, 240, and 300.

item.Description: Array of steps for each tangent actuator in sequence.

SALTelemetry.Description: Axial actuator encoder position. The sign of the position is consistent with the optical coordinate system as per LTS-136. The elements are the actuator Ids from 1 to 72. The related ring Ids are B1-B30, C1-C24, and D1-D18.

item.Description: Encoder position of each axial encoder in sequence.

SALTelemetry.Description: Tangent actuator encoder position. The sign of the position is consistent with the optical coordinate system as per LTS-136. The elements are the actuator Ids from 73 to 78. The related ring Ids are A1-A6. The related degrees are 0, 60, 120, 180, 240, and 300.

item.Description: Encoder position of each tangent encoder in sequence.
ILC status. The elements are the actuator Ids from 1 to 78. The value needs to be transformed from decimal to hexadecimal to understand. The details are in code 67, LTS-346.
Readings from the A1 displacemet sensors: theta-z and delta-z.
Readings from the A2 displacemet sensors: theta-z and delta-z.
Readings from the A3 displacemet sensors: theta-z and delta-z.
Readings from the A4 displacemet sensors: theta-z and delta-z.
Readings from the A5 displacemet sensors: theta-z and delta-z.
Readings from the A6 displacemet sensors: theta-z and delta-z.
